SEARCH
Package edu.mu.NorthEastAirlines

Class AirlineManagerSingleton

java.lang.Object
edu.mu.NorthEastAirlines.AirlineManagerSingleton
public class AirlineManagerSingleton extends Object
Primary class that contains all core project functionality.

Class uses singleton strategy design to ensure no duplicates possible, as only one manager should exist at a time. It contains account and fight management methods.

  • Constructor Details

    • AirlineManagerSingleton

      public AirlineManagerSingleton()
      Default constructor.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static AirlineManagerSingleton getInstance()
      Initializes one instance of the AirlineManagerSingleton.

      The singleton is returned to the user to access other core functionality. Prevents multiple objects from being instantiated, if the user attempts to create multiple, the same object will be returned each time.

      Returns:
      An AirlineManagerSingleton object

    • generateRandomFlights

      public boolean generateRandomFlights()
      Creates a random flight object and adds it to the master flight ArrayList.
      Returns:
      Boolean value of whether the flight was successfully added or not

    • createAccount

      public UserAccounts createAccount(String username, String password, String firstName, String lastName)
      Creates a user account object with the provided information and returns that object to them.

      Account usernames must be unique, if a duplicate username is provided the account will not be created.

      Parameters:
      username - The username the user would like to use
      password - The password for the account
      firstName - The user's first name
      lastName - The user's last name
      Returns:
      A UserAccounts object

    • login

      public boolean login(String username, String password)
      Logs a user into their account after authenticating a provided username and password.

      If an account does not exist or the user provides an incorrect password they will not be logged into the account.

      Parameters:
      username - The account username
      password - The password to the account
      Returns:
      Returns whether the account was logged into or not

    • logout

      public boolean logout(String username, String password)
      Logs a user out of their account if provided credentials are correct.
      Parameters:
      username - The account username seeking to be logged out
      password - The password of the account
      Returns:
      Returns whether the account has been logged out or not

    • viewAccountInformation

      public boolean viewAccountInformation(String username)
      Prints relevant user account information.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the requested account
      Returns:
      Returns true if the account was found and information printed

    • listBookedFlights

      public boolean listBookedFlights(String username)
      Lists the booked flights of a user.
      Parameters:
      username - Requested account username
      Returns:
      Returns true if the account was found and information was printed

    • deleteAccount

      public boolean deleteAccount(String username, String password)
      Deletes a user account by removing it from the account list.
      Parameters:
      username - Username of account wanting to be deleted
      password - Password of account
      Returns:
      Returns true if the account has been deleted

    • printAccounts

      public void printAccounts(String password)
      Prints all user accounts in the allAccounts ArrayList.

      Requires the admin password to be used.

      Parameters:
      password - The administrative password

    • changePassword

      public boolean changePassword(String username, String password, String newPassword)
      Updates a user password to a new password.
      Parameters:
      username - Username of account to update password for
      password - Existing password for authentication of account
      newPassword - New password for account
      Returns:
      Result of update -- success (true) or fail (false)

    • setSeatSelectionStrategy

      public void setSeatSelectionStrategy(SeatSelectionStrategy strategy)
      Changes the current seat selection strategy
      Parameters:
      strategy - The strategy to change to

    • cancelFlightReservation

      public boolean cancelFlightReservation(int flightNumber, String username)
      Cancels flight reservation.

      Provided username and flight number will be used to cancel a reservation on a flight. The account-selected seat will be set to available and the flight information removed from the user account.

      Parameters:
      flightNumber - Flight to cancel reservation on
      username - Username of account canceling flight
      Returns:
      Success or failure of cancellation

    • findFlightByNumber

      public Flight findFlightByNumber(int flightNumber)
      Searches for a specific flight from the allFlights master ArrayList and returns the flight with the matching flight number on success or null on failure
      Parameters:
      flightNumber - Flight identification number
      Returns:
      Flight object that matches the given flight identification number

    • determinePointsToDeduct

      public int determinePointsToDeduct(AccountStatus membershipLevel)
      Calculates the number of points that will be lost after canceling a flight at specific membership levels
      Parameters:
      membershipLevel - Takes an instance of the AccountStatus enum attached to a given UserAccount
      Returns:
      An integer to determine point deduction

    • bookFlight

      public boolean bookFlight(UserAccounts account)
      Reserves a seat on a specified flight.

      Reserves a seat on a flight for a specified user. Utilizes SeatSelectionStrategy to handle seat booking based on user account level.

      Parameters:
      account - Account to reserve a seat under
      Returns:
      Result of booking (true or false)
      See Also:
      • SeatSelectionStrategy

    • viewAvailableFlights

      public boolean viewAvailableFlights()
      Lists all flights.

    • addFlightsToMasterList

      public void addFlightsToMasterList(int count)
      Populates the master flight list iteratively.
      Parameters:
      count - The number of flights to add to the master flight list

    • viewPlaneSeats

      public boolean viewPlaneSeats(int searchFlightNumber)
      Lists seat information for a given flight
      Parameters:
      searchFlightNumber - The flight to list seats for

    • changeMembershipLevel

      public boolean changeMembershipLevel(UserAccounts user, AccountStatus membership)
      Updates user membership level
      Parameters:
      user - User account to update membership level
      membership - New membership level for account
      Returns:
      Whether account membership level was updated successfully or not
